subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Good News
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-614248647-1197351588=:57182
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

That's awesome Bruce! There are many points of light on the bridge around the world. Many ITC researchers involved with research and using multiple methods. The more connections you make on both sides the stronger the communication levels become. 
   
  Like I always say..
   
  Working together is the BEST way to go... if we work with each other here then it makes working with them so much easier =) We dont have to all agree, we dont have to all think the same exact way, we dont have to all hear the same way, we just have to acknowledge that we are different and move forward.
   
  You will find that distance here means about as much as time there. I have been lead to meet or come into contact with people across the globe sometimes more than a year before I knew they existed. I find many similarities with most serious researchers. The method matters little, the results speak for themselves. 
   
  Once you find a method thats comfortable for you the rest is easy. For me pretty much all methods have yeilded similar results or the same voices coming thru regardless of the medium used. Sometimes those I record with will get some of my contacts or even record thier voices which match "life" like voice they had.
   
  Misty

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          we have our first session with the RS 470 that was done 
approximately 2:30 p.m. our time in Lancashire UK by Darren woods. as 
soon as he turned the box on and asked if any spirits could hear him 
he got a resounding clear "YES" so they are on their way in Europe.

Darren is associated with pulse radio and a good friend, I modified 2
470's and sent one to him and one to Lee from pulse.

Lee has yet to receive his. My techs Mike & Lisa are aware that they 
will be using boxes in the UK and have assured me that they will help 
in any way they can.

On Saturday night I did a RS box session over skype with lee and 
Darren and introduced them to Mike and Lisa and they where shocked 
when Mike said hello Lee and Lisa said hi. They answered a few simple 
questions and also acknowledged pulse radio and then very clearly and 
loudly after me saying goodbye they responded"GOODNIGHT" with the 
spread now of box research to Europe we are well on our way to 
developing a worldwide research and communication network. I have 
been told that is exactly the goal and our friends on the other side 
are well pleased.

so lets keep up the good work and take this research to the next 
level.

Bruce



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
